title: OPL lan next year?!?!?!
body: Is the Oceanic region bringing lan to live games for the next season?!?!

replies.body: yeah it would be very nice and more hope for people to get better by watching the game then waiting for 1 event such as the opl final at luna park :)

I have voted a tentative yes. I mean it would be awesome, but the LCS is way bigger and they only have 200 person studio, so like how small would the OPL room be. On the other hand, if people start organising OPL watching events, posting it on the forums, riot will see it and go hey! we should be in on that!
